title: PSA: It is now Preseason here is what that means
body:
FAQ: 

**_"So what is the point of playing ranked now?"_**

**ans:** Although ranked rewards are now locked in, you can still gain and lose MMR/LP. Your division can still go up and down. If you are Silver 1 now and get to Gold 3 by the beginning of next season then your reset will reset you from Gold 3 not Silver 1. In other words climbing during preseason just gives you a head start on next season.  

**_"When does next season start?" _**

**ans:** January 23rd 2019

**_"I thought preseason has big changes? Where are they?"_**

**ans:** Preseason does have many big changes coming. This will all happen during the next patch, considering patches are every 14 days this should be expect to drop 11/20 or so. You can look at all those changes here: http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html (scroll 3/4 of the way down). 

**_"When are Season 8 rewards distributed?" _**

**ans:** Earned rewards will hit your account by December 12th, 2018 

**_"If I was not honor level 2 what does this mean for me?" _**

**ans:** Check out this new post, you may be able to earn your reward still. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/TGYs0hwO-2018-end-of-season-rewards-and-honor
